Description: St Anthony, the first hermit, holding a closed book against his chest with his left hand and leaning on a walking stick upon which is hung a bell, a pig at his left Engraving
Bibliographic references: Delaborde 1888 / Marc-Antoine Raimondi: Etude Historique et Critique suivie d'un catalogue raisonné des oeuvres du maitre (129.74)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
